Name: Fantasia
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, stir and serve with straws.
Review: A Spanish twist on the popular Australian LLB. Beware, the use of bitters will add trace amounts of alcohol to this cocktail.
History: Discovered in 2004 at Claris Hotel, Barcelona, Spain.
Nutrition: One serving of Fantasia contains 26 calories
